content:
Vienna | 27.02.2024 | On February 23, on the 4th day of the massacre of 5 women, another woman became the victim of the patriarchal mentality.

While the protests of the massacres continued, on February 26, the Austrian press was shaken by the news that a woman was killed by a man except Vienna. Especially the pandemi process and increasing violence, harassment and women's massacres are increasing day by day.

At 18:00 on February 26th, “We don't want to decrease another person” and the rally was held in Vienna, which was attended by hundreds of people. The anger of the audience participating in the action was reflected in the slogans.

In the speeches, especially the Austrian Government and the Ministry of Justice, the Minister of Justice, "you protect women instead of protecting your system, racism by direct targeting immigrants by directing the racist fascist party FPO policy," the statement said.

Especially women came to the microphone and said, ik We had to leave our country from the wars you created, we have no safety in Europe, we have no safety of violence, we came every day we lived daily, I came when I was five years old, then my father was a reliable country, but today is a reliable country. I shout here, I don't have my safety, yes, because we know that no one has the right law in the male -dominated system, we scream on the streets. Today, a thousand people are here, we will be in thousands of squares from now on. We do not leave the streets empty against your racist fascist policy ”.

Walking with the slogans thrown, the cortege was massacred in front of the local, after the leaving candles in front of the local and the speeches of the families, "Jin Jiyan Azadi, Freedom of Women Life" ended with the slogans.
title: Women's murders were protested in Vienna
description: Vienna | 27.02.2024 | On the 4th day of the massacre of 5 women on February 23, another woman to the patriarchal mind ...
author: Ismailbulut
